My life is completely differnt now.

A fresh start...

Its nice.. I see some new faces.. Old faces.. Those who I have had a falling out with.. Maybe we can start over again...

Quit a band.. Have a new one..

Had a girlfriend.. Now nothing..

Didn't work.. Now I work everyday..

However.. I still wish I was a Zombie.

do you ever get that funny feeling? that itch right below the wrist that only a razor blade can scratch?

Summer, I painted a scene that lit the stars for me. Said "I can erase it for you dear." That summer created those words that came to life in three. They were denied by you. Summer I laid down below a glitter adorned night and silently sparkled my own way. Summer I laid down by you and shared my frail light. You gave the dark to me. I looked inside to find the one I sent away. I nearly froze when I stepped inside to find the flowers turned to gray. I closed my eyes and kissed them one lest time. I wanted this excoriation. I thrive on this self mutilation. Summer, a morning so pale, alone when they found me. As I remained sleeping I heard them say "This summer created a boy of abject misery." He was designed by you. So like a lost child I will hide, and like a lost lie I will find a way to return to the one who made me. Cover your eyes and we'll die together. Will you cry for me? Will you cry for me, or will you cry with me? I've been a lonely one. I've had this whole world drained from me. Am I the only one? I've had this world drained from me. Summer, I painted a scene that lit the stars for me. Said "I can erase it for you dear."

i can only go to work and them come home, he dragged me from my bedroom down the stairs by my ankles yesterday and made us leave the house so he could scream at me while driving so the neightbors wouldnt call the cops. he had my phone at home disconnected, and he has isolated me from my friends and parents. i think he is going to end up killing me, he almost did yesterday, he knows how to physcially hurt me without leaving marks. i want to die and i have no one to talk to no where to go, he said that if if i tried to have him kicked out of my house that it would take at least 3 months to have him removed legally even tho his name is on nothing and that during that time he would trash the house, shit everywhere and kill me. i dunno what to do, i would need someone to move his shit out and stay there 24-7 and another person to come to work with me until he found some other dumb bitch to torture. eh, i want to slit his throat while he is sleeping or beat his head in i hate him and the situation so much i can't afford a private investigator, he needs to violate his probabtion, his jail time was postponed from january to june due to "good behavior.who would you show the email to? i am way to scared if someone busted in the house he would for sure snap my neck, he almost did that a few days ago he had all his weight with one arm on my neck and the other hand covering my mouth and nose until i almost passed out. he is psycho and very strong, he was a steriod freak and his arms are like the size of my thighs, he fucking picked up the back of his truck and started bouncing it around the other day. when we go somewhere he takes my keys so i dont sneek off and leave him somewhere. i cant tell me boss he will tell my parents and psycho has already threatend to drag my mother and sister to the desert and rape them in front of me, slit their throats and burn their bodies. all i did was email my best friend in utah with psycho's name/phone/birthday/scrip in case he does kill me. he wants me to go home tonight and take e with him so he can mindfuck me more. he said that if i didnt take it he would inject it in my neck, he also said that he would inject me with air to cause and airbubble so it looks like i killed myself. he has over 4 giant boxes of needles in my house for shooting up steriods and shit. see me in person, he may let me go see my baby sister on fri, but likely would follow me to make sure i wasnt lying i dont know where i could meet you. i will try to email you a pic of him so you can show your sharp friends. he is insane.

so the guy trys to get bad with DJ and i just run up and nail the fucker in the face and he falls into a car and is down for the count! hah!

anyways im done now cause LJ is being lame and when i type it desnt get all the keys i hit... ehh.

ah man i need to get out... like i wish someone would come rescue me during the week... sitting here every night waiting for the week end sucks... i cant drive for another damn month and its juts making me misreable... i mean i drive now but i gotta go get somethign authroized and it wont be for a month... so therefore i cant take the car now... blah.

i wanna hang out with someone new.. i love my boys to death so it snothign against them i just wanna meet someone new is all or hang with someone i havent in a while.. someone who can chill apreciates afi... well ya dont have to but tid be nice and wouldnt mind watching waynes world with me... any takers? 

as for this week NOTHING is going on.

DJ gets here friday... anyone here know of a party? cause we gotta show these cali kids that theirs more to az then kickin shit in the desert... so if yall know of a partyu this weekend and wouldnt mind some punks there.. let me know...


now im off to sleep

so i get this phone call last week from storage USA where we practice

"is this one of the band members?"
yes.
"you better get down here the lock on your door has been cut"
FUCK.

yep... they jacked me all except for my drums..
4 guitars
PA system
my amp head
alexs whole amp
chases amp
damaged cymbals
mics jacked
and whoel bunch of other shit to make the grand total about 6 grand in gear...
all this and i miss gena.. (yes i know im lame)

oh well insurance covers it... brand new les paul for me.. woo.

sucks though cause i just got in touch with mark at ADD and he offered to put us on a comp hes doing with self destruct,the 99s (x devotchkas), and caustic christ (x aus rotten) and like 10 others... and i agreed and i told him wed go record a brand new song for it but its kinda hard when we dont have any fucking gear.

anyway val is moving to boston to live with mark.. exciting!.

currently trying to plan a west coast tour with drats right now.. hope it can work out.. hofelly regardless this summer we will hit the road so all you fucks who have me on yer friends list if we hit yer town u better get yer crews there... and if anyone can set us up a good show let me know.. other then that i get to see DJ in a week or so.. let the good times begin
